data.name: home.press.read

data.name: home.points.more
data.value: More

data.name: home.points.point_1
data.value: Only members can participate in the launch of the $LEMON token, and to become a member you only need an invitation.

data.name: home.points.point_1_more_p_1
data.value: During the launch phase, each new member at Lehmon Brothers has a maximum amount of $LEMON that can be reserved exclusively for them, and there is no payment required to make the reservation. The maximum amount for reservation is variable; the maximum amount decreases with each new member. So, the sooner you join, the more $LEMON you can reserve.

data.name: home.points.point_2
data.value: The invitation is made through a unique link generated for each member; you need to be connected with your Cardano wallet on the Lehmon website.

data.name: home.points.point_2_more_p_1
data.value: Just access the link; adding a name will make it easier for the invite owner to know it’s you (they will need to approve your entry). As soon as you join, 10% of the total amount of $LEMON will be reserved for you. After the token distribution, entry into the community will be blocked for new members for new exclusive actions for those already part of it.

data.name: home.points.point_3
data.value: Once you join, you will have your invitation link and 5 invites that you can use to invite whoever you want. Whenever you approve the entry of a new member, you reserve an additional percentage of $LEMON.

data.name: home.points.point_3_more_p_1
data.value: After the token distribution phase, new invites may be made available as new activities are launched for the community.

data.name: home.points.point_4
data.value: After the invitation and reservation phase, which will happen for a very limited time, the contribution phase will begin, where we will raise funds for the $LEMON liquidity pool.

data.name: home.points.point_4_more_p_1
data.value:
The total amount will be added to the liquidity pool as stated in the tokenomics section. The contribution phase is divided into two parts that occur simultaneously: The first is that any member with reserved tokens can participate with a minimum contribution of 20 ADA, which will entitle them to receive the airdrop with the amount that was effectively reserved. The second part is the token distribution with participation from the pool.</br></br>
Example. If we raise 100 ADA for the pool, the member who contributed 20 ADA will receive 20% of the tokens allocated for the pre-sale; if they participated in the token reservation phase, they will also receive the reserved amount. However, another member who did not participate in the token reservation phase and contributes the same 20 ADA, for example, will only receive the 20% of the tokens allocated for the pre-sale.

data.name: home.points.point_5
data.value: Anyone can participate in the contribution phase, whether they are a member or not of Lehmon Brothers. To participate, simply send a minimum of 20 ADA to a wallet address that will be disclosed on all our social media, website, and community. There is no maximum limit for contributions.

data.name: home.points.point_5_more_p_1
data.value: The distribution phase will be the time when a fundraiser will take place, with a minimum amount of 20 ADA and no maximum limit. This phase is open, and anyone can participate. The percentage relative to the total ADA sent to the fundraising wallet will be the corresponding percentage of $LEMON that you will receive in this phase. Members who have already reserved $LEMON and participated in the fundraising will receive the amount relative to their contribution to the pool, plus the tokens reserved in the reservation phase.

data.name: home.points.point_6
data.value: After the fundraising phase, 100% of the total ADA raised (minus transfer and airdrop fees) will go to the liquidity pool, which will initially be created on a DEX chosen by the community and may later have other pools on new DEXs created to increase the reach of $LEMON.

data.name: home.points.point_6_more_p_1
data.value: All participation and decisions regarding the direction that Lehmon Brothers will take concerning $LEMON will be made through voting within the exclusive community.

data.name: home.points.point_7
data.value: Breaking the adoption barrier and creating a highly distributed token depends solely on you, so your participation in all community actions is of utmost importance, and that's why you will have the right to reserve tokens as a way of thanking the entire Brothers community, both those who are already here and those who will come

data.name: home.points.point_7_more_p_1
data.value: Lehmon Brothers, with its $LEMON, is more than just a memecoin project; it’s a cultural revolution. New things will come to greatly foster the community and make $LEMON yield good lemonade.

data.name: home.point_more
data.value: Learn more

data.name: home.win.win_3_txt

data.name: about.article
data.value: About

data.name: about.article.article_p
data.value: Lehmon Brothers is an initiative created with the aim of building a community using viral mechanisms and artificial intelligence to generate the entire marketing strategy, showcasing the power of Cardano and demonstrating that we can have more than two strong memecoins, reflecting the maturity of Cardano as a blockchain.

data.name: tokenization.article_p
data.value: A medium lemon can produce approximately 30-45 ml of juice.

data.name: tokenization.li_span_p_1
data.value: 50% of the token supply will be distributed among all pre-sale participants. Of these tokens, 50% (25% of the total - 11,250,000,000) will be made available in the reservation phase. The other 50% (25% of the total - 11,250,000,000) will be made available in the pre-sale open to the public, with no prior qualifications. Distribution will be based on a snapshot of the funds sent and carried out through an airdrop. Pre-sale participants who have reserved tokens will receive a proportional share in the distribution, in addition to the amount of tokens effectively reserved.

data.name: tokenization.li_span_p_2
data.value: 40% of the token supply will be allocated for initial liquidity. Liquidity Provider (LP) tokens will be stored in a multisig wallet for added security.

data.name: tokenization.li_span_p_3
data.value: 6% of the token supply will be used for marketing promotions, community airdrops, events, and incentives to promote $LEMON.

data.name: tokenization.li_span_p_4
data.value: 3% of the token supply is reserved for exchange listings and expansion opportunities.

data.name: tokenization.li_span_p_5
data.value: 1% will be distributed in the first weeks during events for the Lehmon Brothers community that have reserved tokens.

data.name: tokenization.li_span_title_2
data.value: 40% - Initial Liquidity:

data.name: tokenization.li_span_title_3
data.value: 6% - Marketing:

data.name: tokenization.li_span_title_4
data.value: 3% - Reserve:

data.name: tokenization.li_span_title_5
data.value: 1% - Community Events:
